description: At the end of my course, students will be able to understand your role in determining what types of products and services to offer, how completion plays a positive role in your business and how to go about rebranding your company. You will also have a solid understanding of why you need policies and procedures, how to create and manage them so they not only provide the most value to your business but also for your customers and clients.
title: Building Blocks of Entrepreneurial Success
